mapper.select: SELECT (select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '2' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '1') AS REG_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '5' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '1') AS REG_UPD_CNT ,( select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat in ('2', '5') and mas.pl_reg_stat = '1' and (mas.cre_app_fi_date::date - NOW()::date) <= 5 ) AS REG_FI_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat in ('2', '5') and mas.pl_reg_stat = '1') AS REG_ADMIN_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '3' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3') AS UPD_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '6' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3') AS UPD_UPD_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat IN ('3', '6') and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3') AS UPD_ADMIN_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '4' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3') AS DROP_CNT ,( select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat = '7' and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3' and pl_hist_cd is not null ) AS DROP_UPD_CNT ,( select count(*) from tb_lc_mas01 mas where mas.pl_stat in ('4', '7') and mas.pl_reg_stat = '3' and pl_hist_cd is not null ) AS DROP_ADMIN_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_members tlm where tlm.appr_stat = '2' and tlm.cre_yn = 'N' and tlm.drop_yn = 'N') AS MEMBER_NO_REG_CNT ,(select count(*) from tb_lc_members tlm where tlm.appr_stat = '1' and tlm.cre_yn = 'N' and tlm.drop_yn = 'N') AS MEMBER_REG_ADMIN_CNT
